𓍶 𓋪 𓃉

𓏘 𓂋 𓂋 𓏏 𓋪 karta कर्त "hole" < कृत् kṛt "cut" 𓃉 𓋪 Kreis *krītaną “to scratch; carve” κίρκος kírkos, “circle, ring” cyclos 𓍶 κρίκος kríkos

gīrbin “number”, Old Church Slavonic жрѣбии (žrěbii, “lot, tallymark”, Ancient Greek γράφειν (gráphein, “to scratch, etch”.

𓐍 𓃀 𓋴 𓍅 | hack up (earth) | chops grabe… carve… 𓐍 𓃀 𓊃 𓏴 | ploughlands | جریب jerib < گریب girīb(us) +++ Ackerbaus <> گِرِفْتَن grab/grib/гра́бить 𓐍 𓃀 𓋴 𓅱 𓈇 𓏥 | ploughlands | acreibis აკრი (aḳri) έικρ n (éikr)
